title: Zipmex Thailand suspends trading amid regulatory compliance efforts
description: Zipmex Thailand, a prominent digital asset exchange, immediately halted all trading activities on its platform. This suspension, effective from November 25, 2023, marks a critical juncture for the exchange and its users, drawing attention to the regulatory environment surrounding digital assets in the region. Compliance with regulatory standards Zipmex Thailand’s decision to pause trading was ... Read more

title: Robinhood’s Potential Relisting of Solana: A Game-Changer for Crypto Investors
description: Analysts take a look at the impact of Robinhood’s relisting of Solana on the price.  Analyst has predicted that Solana could go as high as $300 in early next year.  In June this year, crypto exchange Robinhood announced its decision to delist three major assets – Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), and Solana (SOL).
